post.text: Tune in for a live conversation on making college affordable for everyone with Hillary and Bernie Sanders at the University of New Hampshire.

comment.author: Alyssa
comment.text: It's sad that Bernie has become the lapdog for this corporate tool. Hopefully he holds her accountable when she sells out in office.

replies.author: Shyanne
replies.text: Not that he will be able to do anything except complain that she didn't keep her promises.

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: Boy do you have the wrong impression of her.
